title: ess的back
author: Inogny
txt_content: 为什么我死后，ess会提示让我使用back回去，而且是英文，其他都就不是英文，我想汉化一下这个

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
用压缩软件打开 ess 插件。

编辑 messages_zh.properties

增加下面这些内容，自行汉化
backUsageMsg=\u00a76Returning to previous location.
backAfterDeath=\u00a76Use the\u00a7c /back\u00a76 command to return to your death point.
backOther=\u00a76Returned\u00a7c {0}\u00a76 to previous location.
backUsageMsg=\u00a76Returning to previous location.

replies.author: C5bb
replies.txt_content:
使用winrar格式打开ESS.jar
找到plugin.yml
丢到桌面使用N++打开
搜索back 然后改   description:     后面的内容    改完记得保存覆盖回去
back:
    description: Teleports you to your location prior to tp/spawn/warp.
